Our partners get the chance to organize exclusive Side Events in the Partner Side Event Wing – right next door to the Slush Main Event. Side Events are our partners’ favorite tool to cater to a more targeted audience ranging from 50 to 350 visitors.

Partner Side Events are a turnkey service. We produce the venue, help set up the venue with volunteers, and send direct invites to your ideal audience of Slush visitors to make sure that the event is a font_line_height=”1″ font_size_tablet=”6vw” font_size_phone=”8vw”][/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]Aside from the extravaganza taking place in the halls of Messukeskus, a key part of Slush are all the Side Events taking place around Helsinki during the same week.

Anyone is welcome to host a Community Side Event in Helsinki during Slush for free. Providing this opportunity has been one of the core building blocks of what Slush brings to the ecosystem – and will be in 2023 too.

How do I list a Community Side Event?

It’s simple – find your way to Slush Platform:

  1. Open “My events” from the left-hand bar
  2. Open the green “Create an event” tap in the top right corner
  3. Choose “Create Community Side Event”
  4. Fill in the application and submit
  5. We will review your application and get back within a week
  6. When all is good and clear, the event will listed under “Other Side Events” on Slush Platform
